div.head: ¶ Piers H. Gent. in commendation of the Authour.
div.l: YOu gallant Brutes, whose trauailes farre abrode
can testifie your strange desire of newes:
Cast Ankor here, for loe in English roade,
there rides the Language, that so many chuse.
Smal cost may serue, no hazard to your health,
here may you win, without expence of wealth.
Florioes first Fruites, can teach you first to learne,
And next by tyme, the profite to discerne.
